attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have noticed that some menial crimes come with a lot tougher punishment than some o the more serious crimes.
The system then is making a mockery of its self!!

I propose that murderes pedophiles that have been tested positive in DNA should be centanced to LIFE .. which means not released!!!

Atemptive murder should be 15 years and released after cleared by a psychiatrist.

Manslaughter should be 15 years the same as atemptive murder but can be released early.

Driving without due care and atention, drink driving or under the influence of drugs should be a life ban and 15 years inprisonment minimun.

Theft should warrent 4 years comunity service and two visits to a perole officer.

parking tickets and other menial offences should be dealt with, with a fine or a warning.

All law breakers forfit there human rights when they take some one elses so there can be no cmplain ts about over crouding!!

all prisoners serving sentences shoud do atleast one hour each on a tread mill hooked up to a genorater to power the prisons to save tax payers money.

Get tough

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
